name: Religion and theology
description: Within Arts and Humanities (except languages), this field is the study of religious beliefs, concepts, symbols, expressions, texts of spirituality, and the nature of the divine. [cite: 84]

name: Religious history
description: The study of the historical development of religions, their traditions, and their impact on societies, a component of Religion and theology. [cite: 84]

name: Study of sacred books
description: The critical examination and interpretation of texts considered sacred within various religious traditions, as part of Religion and theology. [cite: 84]

name: Study of different religions
description: Comparative or individual study of various world religions, their beliefs, practices, and histories, within Religion and theology. [cite: 84]

name: Theology
description: The systematic study of the nature of the divine and, more broadly, of religious belief, a core discipline in Religion and theology. [cite: 84]
